QuestData.Title: Immortality?
QuestData.Description: Something is... off. The water feels strange.$b$bWhen we arrived here I felt the presence of the Light, strong and vibrant, far to the north.$b$bI thought it would be the Pools of Youth. But this... this water is tainted somehow. Stained with mogu magics.$b$bI think it best I try only a sip and we see what happens.
QuestData.LogDescription: Observe Vaeldrin as he tests the water of youth.
QuestData.RewardText: Wha... what happened? The water... it... it only transfers life. It will not make new life.
